author: Slidebean
description:
Meta showed off its new $799 AI-powered Ray-Ban glasses—built-in display, notifications, hands-free controls—and two live demo fails blamed on “bad Wi-Fi.” 
Even Zuck couldn’t save the awkwardness.

👉 Listen to the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up—where we roast the week’s biggest startup and tech news—now streaming on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, or wherever you get your shows.
title: Meta’s $799 Smart Glasses Flop on Stage
